website_summaries.verdict: More point-and-shoot than dSLR in terms of features and performance than some competing high-end megazooms, the Nikon Coolpix P520 is a very good camera for those after a big zoom range, better control over results, and fine picture quality.
pros: Give the Nikon Coolpix P520 plenty of light and it can turn out some excellent photos throughout its 42x zoom range.
It has a lot of shooting options for those who like to fiddle with settings or straight snapshooters
and built-in GPS and support for Nikon's Wi-Fi adapter for use with Android and iOS devices
cons: Its autofocus system is slow when the lens is zoomed in, especially when compared with other models in its class
and the camera feels cheaply constructed

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy—died after a couple uses!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had the camera since Nov 2017 and literally used about 5 times!! Was using over the weekend snapping pictures of my daughters birthday parties and turned off when not in use and now it won’t come on! Tried multiple batteries, charging overnight and camera won’t turn on! When googling issue, found this is a common issue of the camera just dying! Horrible product! Would never buy again!! Such a waste of $500 and many missed memories captured!! Then told will cost a few hundred to fix!! Beyond annoyed- Camera was always kept in camera bag- never dropped, damaged etc!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Saddlemire

customer_reviews.title: A fine camera, more compact than a DSLR with its ...
customer_reviews.text: A fine camera, more compact than a DSLR with its multiple lenses, but fitted with an excellent zoom lens and capable of shutter-priority, aperture-priority and fully manual operation. Think of it as a halfway point between a pocket point-and-shoot and a DSLR that's so bulky you end up using your phone instead. The in-camera three-image HDR often delivers a good result; but HDR photos tend to be too exposed, and so require further adjustment by computer editor. So you might as well just take bracketed exposure-compensation shots and merge them on a computer where you have more control. Slowest shutter speed is eight seconds, long enough to make those silky waterfall shots I've always admired.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Vilas

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginning photographer, I was looking for something easy to use that provided awesome quality pictures. I had messed around with a P510 in a store, but then realized the P520 was the "upgrade". I went with my gut instinct and bought this camera. I am SO happy that I did! I have pulled off some shots that I never thought possible, I am overly pleased with this camera! The ONLY gripe that I have so far is that I wish it came with a more in-depth instruction manual. 11 out of 13 pages tell you how to "set the camera up" and then you're pretty much left to your own devices. Finding videos online have helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Hardesty

customer_reviews.title: Camera in good shape though zoom on right side doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The seller rated the camera as regular, so according to amazon this means the camera will be in good use with all its features though it might have scratches etc, but its features as a camera will be intact, which is no true. The camera was actually in better shape than I imagined because it is almost new: without scratches etc, good strip, etc. However the zoom button next to the shutter button (not the one located in the lens) doesn't work. That's my only complaint for now. I think that should have been advertised since the most important one is that one.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: This is one wonderful camera . . . and so is the Seller!
customer_reviews.text: Electromax has outstanding service! There was a mix-up regarding the camera's color at first. Customer service called me immediately and explained the situation. I told them only the red Nikon P520 would do.They asked me to give them 24 hours to find one. THEY DID IT! There was a slight delay receiving my order due to the mix-up which was no surprise. My camera is ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS.It will take some time to learn how to use all the features. As far as I can tell right now, my P520 works beautifully. It's everything I hoped for and more. I will definitely buy from Electromax again. THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: 123 Adams

customer_reviews.title: Everyone's Camera
customer_reviews.text: From the days of my Argus C-3 years ago I have enjoyed taking photos of my travels and now my family. I welcomed the change from Kodak film to digital photography - what an incredible change. For a few years I enjoyed using a basic Canon point and shoot and it served me well. Now with the Nikon CoolPIX P520 I have a better zoom lens and more pixels. It took me only a few minutes to learn how to use the camera and I would certainly buy the camera again. I am happy to recommend this as a camera for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: hrt

customer_reviews.title: More than worth the Price.
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift for another person but since I have one two generations earlier, I was able to play with it to quickly get an opinion on it's features and improvements. Everything about it is much better than my version... good clear, sharp, true to color photos and easy to use. My only complaint would be that it is still sometimes difficult to focus/see what you are trying to get a pic of, either with the view finder or LED screen. All in all, I love it, my friend, who is right next door where I can continue to see how it performs, loves it. It's more than worth the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Quite a nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I am not photo-guru and this is my first camera which cost more than $100. It takes excellent pictures and for someone with hands that are a bit shaky, it prevents pictures from coming out blurry. It also takes very nice pictures at night even without using the flash.
customer_reviews.author: William Cook

customer_reviews.title: The perfect camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is almost perfect, the photos are always excellent, the speed for the zoom is very good, the grip it offers is very good, you are never afraid it will fall from your hand, the weight is perfect, finally I could mention a thousand things in favor of this camera except that sometimes even when in open field it does not mark the coordinates. I recommend it and all of the Coolpix models. By the way I love the very low price also.
customer_reviews.author: ventarron

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The photos taken with this camera are awesome quality. I need to take an online course on using all the features, but I have no complaints. It can be used in the basic, simple modes and still get great photos. Just wish I could get a polarizing filter that actually screws onto the lens. I also purchased the Nikon WU-1a Wireless Mobile Adapter for it because I didn't want to chance loosing discs along the way on a very long trip. I do wish I'd just bought the camera with the built-in WIFI, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: KitV

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st time DSLR camera.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the many reviews from several sites about the camera I decided to buy it. I purchased this from Amazon because of the price and freebies included and off course free shipping because of Amazon Prime. Since this is my 1st DSLR camera I suspect some of the problems I am having are user error. I do agree with most reviewers that the camera takes a bit of time to focus when using the zoom feature. The battery life has been very good. I am enjoying using the many features of the camera and have captured several fantastic photos. I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: James Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Issues after 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Used this camera for the first 5 months without problem. Then the buttons for preview, delete, menu, display etc stopped working. Sometimes, the buttons will respond for a short period of time and then stops responding. I have to preview my photos using my computer these days. Don't know if there's anything like update to run in order to correct this. Returning the camera from Nigeria is not worth the cost and I have to manage it that way. Just hope this is not a general problem with this machine as I have recommended it to my friends before this incident. My battery is fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Davechuks

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months of use . . .
customer_reviews.text: My desire was for the maximum bang in the most compact camera package. This is perfect for me. My photographs are remarkable. Clarity is amazing. Zoom is spectacular. Low light capabilities are unbelievable. Speed of warm-up and operation is incredibly fast. I'm impressed!!! If I could give it more stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Super Zoom
customer_reviews.text: I tried both this and the Sony and chose the Nikon for superior color fidelity. The zoom capability is excellent and the dense focal plane ensures a high resolution photo. The negatives, as others have pointed out, are that the focus is a tad slow and it feels a little cheap and plasticky. But having said that, it's light enough to throw in your camera bag without a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: David Huchital

customer_reviews.title: Great Digital Camera (No gadget bag required)
customer_reviews.text: I have had many cameras over the years but this is one of the best. No fussing with lens changing. Extremely compact for a SLR style camera. Eighteen megapixels and image-stabilization produces sharp, well-lit photos in all lighting conditions. I added a 32 GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card, so I am ready to shoot all day. Oh yes, it also does 1080p HD videos with stereo sound. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Old Aviator

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high end camera for a beginner or intermediate user. It would be a 4 star camera for an experienced person who had other cameras. The camera has numerous features and will take a while to perfect a good command of the features and provides excellent results. In addition to my use I have introduced this camera to my family and it will most certainly exceed their needs for a good while and provide a lot of enjoyment
customer_reviews.author: Andrew  P. DiMartino

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera. So easy to use, but also produces 'professional' pictures. I first heard of the camera from a lady on a tour of Scotland with me. She loved it and recommended it highly. The directions could have been more informative, but if you fiddle with it enough it is pretty intuitive. Love the weight and 'fit' in the hand. I bought extra batteries, but this one still seems fine. I like the visual settings, etc. that you can see in the viewfinder.
customer_reviews.author: Adelicia

customer_reviews.title: P520
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I decided to go for it. I am very happy with this camera. Not true DSLR and not a pocket camera. Feels god in the hands and it take GREAT photos and videos. One of my main reason to purchase, other than being a Nikon, was because I could wifi my pics to my iPad with the done and it shoots 3D pics. Very cool. The zoom is fantastic. Although it sometimes has a time trying to auto focus, but all in all....Great camera
customer_reviews.author: Electronic Hobbiest

customer_reviews.title: Good, but spends too much battery
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the image is good, there's a lot of controls to help you make that goodlooking photo. But, for me, it spends to much battery, especially if you turn the GPS function ON. It drains you battery very quick (half a day of shooting). The zoom is not manual, so every move uses the battery juice. If you turn the camera off, the zoom is drawn back, with the battery's juice. There's not real manual Focus. For me, it is important. I like to be abble of focusing on my own. So, I returned it and purchased a Fujifilm Finepix HS50exr. Much better in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. A lot of cameras looked at did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A lot of cameras looked at did not have view finder which this one does for those bright daylight shots. Doing a lot of practicing with all the many options. Shots coming out great even the close ups. Night shots great and clear. Did moon shot which shows clear craters of moon with the 40 x zoom. This is my second point and shoot and has a lot of options to use. Love the GPS location of pictures on a map, cool. I have no disappointments with this camera at all. Looking forward to future practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Won't work
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid Nikon user, however, I wish I could return this item. It will not take more than 4 shots before the battery is exhausted. It also locks up and if you do get to take more than 4 shots, you can't shut it down until you take the battery out. I sent it back to Nikon who said they could not replicate the problem. Buy the cheaper one, one step down from this one; my husband has that one and it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not really very good
customer_reviews.text: Just took on a European vacation thought it would be ideal for travel pics. On-off button and shutter button worked intermittently making it unreliable and difficult to grab a quick photo of something. Focus is not so bad as to be called soft, but it isn't sharp and crisp. Battery life was usually good, but went dead without any warning. Most photos needed Photoshop work before printing because they were very flat and dull. I'm comparing this to my wife's Panasonic which was reliable, took sharp bright photos which didn't need any preprinting work. To say I'm disappointed is an understatement, I'm going back to my 3-year-old Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpybear

customer_reviews.title: Replacement in Kind
customer_reviews.text: My old one died and I wanted another of the same. Came on time and works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Lot More Camera Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: The P-250 is a lot more camera than expected. As soon as I master a capability the camera has I discover even more functions that are even more useful. I purchased the P250 for an upcoming trip to Alaska knowing the big zoom capability would be a big plus but now expect this camera to be an all around great camera. While it's not magic in the point and shoot mode, it can produce outstanding images with the proper settings.
customer_reviews.author: P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera for my trip to Europe. I didn't want to spend too much money, so I purchased a refurbished one. It turned out the charging device inside the camera didn't work. It came with a fully charged battery, which lasted for the 1st 2 days. Then I had to switch to my cell phone camera. I returned the camera after the trip. I wasn't impressed with picture quality either. They are OK, but not great. I expected more from an 18 MP camera. I gave it 2 stars because it worked for the full 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This little baby is awesome! Im really impressed with the Zoom, usually when you take pictures the images are blurry and low quality, this camera makes it look like I was right next to what ever I shoot. It could be better in low light conditions but overall Im really satisfied with it. Great point and shoot camera but also comes with some pro features.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ivan Saborio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this camera for the average point and shoot person who wants to have the ability to zoom up close to distant items of interest. There are better cameras out there but for the price point you will not be disapointed. I use this camera when I am on vacation and love the professional looking photos it produces. I recommend it to anyone - it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Dan the Man

customer_reviews.title: A very good first camera.
customer_reviews.text: It's my first bridge camera, and I can not be more comfortable, but after reading other reviews and try the product, I can say that has some trouble focusing and the zoom speed is not the best. The quality of the screen and Photo is indisputable, and the GPS works great. Needs an bulb mode, increased battery life and raw files.
customer_reviews.author: Carlitos Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Great for the avid picture taker - not yet a armature photographer
customer_reviews.text: I am a photographer who shoots with a Nikon DSLR. I bought this camera for my sister who likes to take pictures but does not want to use a huge piece of equipment. So after looking around I decided to get her the P520. The swivel screen, large MP and the 42X zoom made my sister happy.. the Nikon Lens, possessor and other special functions make me happy. It is a great camera! I love it and I think you will to.
customer_reviews.author: pat-93

customer_reviews.title: Love the Zoom, Hate the Interpolated Picture
customer_reviews.text: As an all-around backpack camera, it's all one can hope for. Good control locations and versatile zoom. The zoom is fast enough as is the focusing. If you are patient, it focuses fine. The pictures are not professional quality even in amateurs' eyes. I take a lot of landscapes and the fine details get a blurred effect, like it's been "processed". As with every other digital camera I've seen, sunrise/sunset photos have a white sun, not a red one. I'm still looking for a great camera for those fine panoramas.
customer_reviews.author: Moab Internet

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for more....
customer_reviews.text: It could very well be me not having a chance to really understand the camera yet. I am coming from a Cannon that shoots super fast....this just did not do that for me. HOWEVER, I really liked having it and using for our vacation shots in NYC. I just will not be using it for my kids sporting events.
customer_reviews.author: Smile

customer_reviews.title: Highly upset and unsatisfied!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this camera in March 2018, nice camera for a nice price. I only used for a few occasions since then. Go to turn it on to take some pictures and it wouldn't come on. Thought maybe it needs to be charged, charges it all throughout the night and next day NOTHING!!!!!!!! U BETTER OFF BUYING SOMETHING ELSE!!!
customer_reviews.author: JennyfromDaBlock

customer_reviews.title: One of the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Since I have the love for taking pics of wild life, I made the choice to spend a little extra money to improve the quality of my photos! Not only has it made a huge difference in the photos but with the GPS turnned on, you don't have to keep stopping to write down where you where when you took the pics....In 1 word, Fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Ole organic farmer

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This camera was great for about 3 months. It crapped out after that and takes a long time to process pictures that are taken... roughly 2 seconds. Makes this camera fairly worthless for photographing anything that's moving. Nikon support has been utterly unhelpful in this endeavor. Thankfully I'm able to file a claim through the insurance I purchased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Petenzi

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Simply a great camera! For the people that might find it complicated because of the many options it provides, I suggest just picking a few modes you commonly use and spend a month or two practicing with it. Add more options as you need them and you gain experience. Don't depend on the little printed manual - download the full manual from the CD or online. I have taken excellent pictures with it over the past month. My wife and I both have this model camera and use them very successfully. I suggested this model to a friend and she loves it as well!
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very good Nikon camera
customer_reviews.text: Nikon cameras have never let me down. I wanted to move up from a basic digital camera with minimal zoom to one where I could capture my grandchildren from a distance while participating in sports. this one does the trick and the quality is very good. I like the rotating screen as well as the easy access record button for video.
customer_reviews.author: AWF620

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Exactly as described. Brand new and perfectly the best. I just loooooooooooooooooooooove Nikon. First time buying this camera and I don't regret it. If there are any bad updates, I'll let you know. But this camera is amazing and I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Incredible photographs
customer_reviews.text: Nice zoom features and awesome resolution. Bought this for my mother-in-law for Christmas and my wife loved it so much that I bought her one for her birthday. We took it on a cruise and were taking pictures of Jamaica from the cruiseship using the zoom, you would have thought we were across the street from some of the buildings and people we were taking pictures of. Ordered the AmazonBasics fixed zoom camera case and it fits like a glove with the strap attached. Can't beat the zoom feature and picture quality in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Charging Problems! Buy extended Warranty too you will need it
customer_reviews.text: after 13 months the camera stopped charging ! So Nikon wants to charge me another $125 to get it fixed. It happened on 2 of these cameras! Not just one... If you buy, get the extended warranty because you will need it
customer_reviews.author: RMR Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera - Zoom feature is super.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Only battery life is unpredictable. Record feature does not support slaved battery assist. I used a battery that charges phones and the like. It would not work on this camera. Lost half of a wedding when battery failed with assist battery source attached.
customer_reviews.author: TPW

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this camera!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Its really easy to use and takes fantastic pictures. I'm just not that savvy with shutter speeds, apertures and such but the automatic setting takes a pretty great shot of just about everything. It does take a bit of studying to figure out the sports feature for fast action and I don't love it for sunsets, but that's just user error I know. If you're looking for a good camera that's easy to use and holds up well, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy george

customer_reviews.title: NIKON CAMERA P520
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS JUST A GREAT CAMERA. I HAVE 2 P510 AND NOW THIS ONE. I ALSO HAVE A D5100 AND D7000 WHICH ARE ALSO EXTREMELY GOOD BUT MORE WORK AND A BIT HEAVIER. I USE ALL OF THEM FOR DIFFERENT THINGS BUT THE P SERIES CAMERAS ARE EASIER TO TRAVEL WITH AND A LITTLE SMALLER.
customer_reviews.author: PERKY

customer_reviews.title: Surprising disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: The extended lens is a total BLUR despite efforts to sharpen it and definitely does not come up to expectations! I immediately reach for my Panasonic DMC-TZ30 "pocket camera" for the Macro floral shots I THOUGHT the Nikon Coolpix P520 would bring superb results with! A lot of advertising hype for poor results and I'm very disappointed in the once "illustrious" Nikon name! :-(
customer_reviews.author: LindyMaeUSA

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, but now thinking about a new one ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, but now thinking about a new one since nikon is always updating, but will still use. It is better than carrying around my slr all the time and great for quick shots when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Used, like photo
customer_reviews.text: The camera was packaged safely and appears to be in good shape and fully functional. The battery was bulging and stuck in the camera, so that was disappointing. Happy to have the camera I like most back in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: C. DeWalt

customer_reviews.title: but it takes great pictures and the zoom capability is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: So far am LOVING this camera. I'm still playing with the settings, but it takes great pictures and the zoom capability is fantastic. Exactly what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lhotka

customer_reviews.title: Electromax is a GREAT Amazon Dealer
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this camera and after I got it and tried it, did some research, decided I wanted to "upgrade" to a Coolpix P600. Electromax was very professional in handling my return. I will definitely do business with them again. Thank you, Electromax :) Diane Nelson
customer_reviews.author: stcroix2

customer_reviews.title: It works great and battery lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I call it the mommy camera, because I purchased it when our first child was born. It works great and battery lasts forever. Takes amazing close up and far away shots. I recommend this to anyone looking for a nice camera.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: It is all that is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Amateur here. This was a Christmas gift to a sophomore that wanted a "professional" camera. She is very tech savy & loves this camera. Dad on the other hand still has his old Nikon equipment, no older, not digital. It was called film then, pretty cool, lots of process, but still some great photographs. Today Dad did not want her to lose lenses & caps and light meters (really) so this was our choice. She's happy, Dad is happy & it does take very good photographs. We have good printers, but not great printers so we are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Robinson

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is by far the very best camera i ever owned. Had it 2 days and went to Asia with it. Flawless, simple to use, super zoom. well worth the bucks. go for it o yeah, killer good video
customer_reviews.author: Stv

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It works just fine and I got this one for a song!
customer_reviews.author: hotchops57

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: The image stabilization isn't all that it's cracked out to be; when you're zoomed in most or all of the way, things get a little blurry. Otherwise, it's the most applicable camera for our needs. Recreational photographers just looking to take photos randomly, at events like baseball games or on trips of the scenery.
customer_reviews.author: Jake B

customer_reviews.title: Super zoom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera that in some ways outperforms my D600. Near professional quality and a very bargain price. Too bad that it won't output Raw files but the zoom is amazing for such a little camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. GochenouerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: My first nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Have always played with photography but nothing serious. Decided to step it up a few notches with this Nikon P-520. Am very happy with the initial results. Took pictures of the the lunar eclipse in April with fantastic results. Have even signed up for a photography course at a local college
customer_reviews.author: Ford guy

customer_reviews.title: I had broke my small Coolpix and needed a good camera to travel with
customer_reviews.text: I had broke my small Coolpix and needed a good camera to travel with. I have taken amazing shots with this camera. It has been a blessing to me and the subjects of my photography. Many have been blessed with beautiful pictures of themselves. Just an awesome all-purpose camera.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Still using 2 years later. NO complaints. Pictures are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera. It's easy to use even for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. I love the features and it's very easy to use. The zoom is incredible and the picture quality is great! Also it has allot of pre set picture settings to. You can't go wrong with this camera. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Frankoc1

customer_reviews.title: Getting to like it.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this camera, I was a little disappointed by some of its features, but the more I learn to use it, the more I like it. I carry it as a companion to my Nikon 7000 and use it for great close up pictures, insects and the like and far away zoom pictures.
customer_reviews.author: jl

customer_reviews.title: Wooow!
customer_reviews.text: As a photographer, I have recommend and bought this Coolpix to many friends and family and have not received any bad comments. The quality of the pictures is stunning for its size!
customer_reviews.author: Berny

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from this guy.  Selling defectives. Wont respond to attempts to resolve
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera and have used it MAYBE a total of 10 times and it wont even turn on now. I contacted seller in attemt to Resolve and i am being ignored. I know Nikon has a great reputation so believe this was refurbished or defective product. If i had written a review when i had first bought it, i would have give it and the seller a good review like so many others did. But, i caution you against buying from this guy if you want first rate product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy P

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P520
customer_reviews.text: To keep it simple this camera is most all of what it is advertised to be. A couple of things that improve on it..... A lens threaded for filters - no such provisions. Also, provisions for an electronic remote shutter release would be of great aid when the lens is all the way out. I would hope to see these added features on a next upgrade to this model by Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I recently developed an interest in photography. This camera is perfect for a beginner. I am having such a great time learning with it. I love the zoom. It is incredible!.
customer_reviews.author: CMJ62

customer_reviews.title: Review for Nikon Coolpix P520 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect camera for me. I've been looking for one that has a higher zoom than the one I have now. My other challenge was to find one with a separate viewfinder...so many of the newer digital cameras only come with the LCD on the back of the camera and it's impossible to see anything in bright daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S. Chadbourne

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this new Nikon camera. The price was fair, the delivery on time. This is the fourth Nikon camera I have owned, and I have been more than satisfied with all.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Paquette

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the pictures that it takes. The zoom is great. Used it at a museum without the flash and the pictures came out OK. Manual on operation is limited. website is no better. Have to figure out a lot on your own.
customer_reviews.author: dorisah

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix p5209
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I have ever had. It is user friendly. The features are easy to navigate and the pictures are beautiful. It is lightweight, easy to charge. The computer program for editing pictures is also user friendly. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: nml

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: very light and takes above average pix with a great optical zoom I own several more expensive Nikons and this one is a great surprise as to the picture quality and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Parks

customer_reviews.title: the only problem is that I need better documentation for the settings
customer_reviews.text: the only problem is that I need better documentation for the settings. I will have to get online and search for better doc than was delivered. Easy to use with auto settings, pictures are sharp and the colors seem pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Great pictures. Low light capabilities and zoom are impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm highly impressed with this camera. I highly recommend this camera for anyone that's a beginner in cameras similar to these. Unfortunately, this model does not have interchangeable lenses. Although, there are multiple different filters for this module. The detail of the photos from this camera are amazing. Also, I highly recommend the user guide for this camera by the title of " Photographer's Guide To The Nikon Coolpix P520" by Alexander S. White. It a very helpful 420 page guide. I ordered mine when I ordered my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera to my girlfriend and she loves it, it's a very good product, we are not photography pros but I think this is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great, the zoom is really something, however you've got yo get to know it to take advantage of al the funtions, love the flip screen, battery is not too bad, although I bought a cople more just in case, happy with this one..
customer_reviews.author: AlejandroGonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a camera for a long time and I have fallen in love with this camera. I am still working out all of the little bugs but this is a great point ad shoot camera! I use it to take photos of my kids playing lacrosse and football. The picture quality is really impressive and the battery life is much better than I expected! I highly recommend this camera and the price point is fantastic as well!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Park

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! The one negative thing, that others have written about, is very true. It's a little slow to auto focus. I enjoy taking pictures of the wild life in the area - and sometimes you need to be fast - not always possible with this camera. But the picture quality is spectacular and it's just the right size for the casual photagrapher.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera. Covers wide angle to extreme telephoto (equivalent ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Covers wide angle to extreme telephoto (equivalent to 1000mm). This camera does everything. One minor recommendation - I also shoot in RAW with my other Nikons and this camera only shoots in JPEG which I have to convert if I want to use Adobe Camera Raw.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rill

customer_reviews.title: camera bag and memory card
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera, I was suppose to receive a camera case and a memory card which is why I decided to order from amazon and not the other one I was looking at. I never received it and was wondering it's status??
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: We visited the grand canyon a few months ago with only a 12mp pocket camera to record our memories. We were very disappointed with the results. We needed a much better camera that was not too pricey. The holiday sale of this excellent camera made it affordable. Excellent pictures with easy options. Wow we love this nikon. The zoom is just unbelievable. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Louis D Williams

customer_reviews.title: nice camera, good price
customer_reviews.text: Camera is fine. I didn't expect the metallic red color, but I like it. Different. It would have been helpful if you'd specified that the package included a rechargeable battery and charging unit. Not being sure about this, I ordered, separately, a charger and two extra batteries, for $20. I didn't need to spend this extra money, guys!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is amazing!! The photos have amazing clarity. Buy a large capacity memory card. I use this at all my daughter's sports games!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: problems with camera
customer_reviews.text: I have some problems with it but I am away for the summer so I have to wait to get home to get my purchase paperwork. It is unreliable for Stuck ON...light wont go out.. no matter how long I press. Get it off by opening up the battery compartment and removing and then replacing battery Wont turn on!!! many tries.... battery and memory card compartment doesnt close completely sometimes
customer_reviews.author: conisain

customer_reviews.title: My Third Nikon Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: Love the 42X Zoom Lens, compact good battery life with rechargeable lithium batteries, red case instead of black, etc. Also like the ease of operation and the new adjustable viewing screen that can be folded back on itself protecting the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Shara

customer_reviews.title: :D
customer_reviews.text: I am NOT a professional photographer nor inclined to be one. But I wanted something with good quality photos and easy to operate. I absolutely LOVE IT!!! Even has the manual focus my husband wanted for some weird reason. Great pics, great features, great video. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Saved4HisGlory

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in March for a trip my husband and I were taking. It is easy to use and the pictures come out really clear. Would recommend this camera to anyone who is taking casual pictures. Although, if you know what you are doing, I would think this camera would also be great for more "formal" pictures and landscapes. The zoom is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: slow
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is nice. But the autofocus is really slow. I use the zoom to creep up on wildlife. But it is often too slow to get the moment I'm trying to capture.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera except for the zooming capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera except for the zooming capabilities. Once you begin to zoom in, the picture gets extremely blurry to the point where you cannot see at all. I would recommend this camera to come one who is not looking to zoom in for pictures, otherwise I honestly would look into another camera!
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Getting back into a great hobby
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle and pictures and video are great. Good camera for somene like myself who has decide to get back into photography at a different level
customer_reviews.author: ARTHUR KEATING

customer_reviews.title: amazing lens amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: i like bird photography. I did not believe that this camera could deliver sharp clear images at equivalent of 1000 mm focal length. It does!
customer_reviews.author: Bob  from Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and works fine...took a little for her to get used to it...but she loves it...Thank goodness, never hear the end if she _____________!!!
customer_reviews.author: joey boy

customer_reviews.title: It Just doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The camera is absolutely dead. I have followed the instructions step by step. I have charged the battery until the charger indicated green light for full charge and nothing. Even when I plug the cord as the Manual indicates, there are not lights, not movement nothing. On the other hand, the delivery was delayed by 2 extra days. I'm absolutely disappointed since I was waiting for this camera for a gift and it is not working at all. I will return this back and I will back here to provide a feedback of the "returning experience". I would not recommend to buy anything to this seller so far.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Martin Perez

customer_reviews.title: Do not like paddle flipping to one side
customer_reviews.text: It's okay should have done more homework before purchase. Do not like paddle flipping to one side. I find it difficult following anything I want to capture with paddle to one side. Just okay. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. I still learning how to use
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I still learning how to use..the zoom is fantastic. You can take excellent pictures form distance, and the video is absolute great. i recommend to someone who wants a big zoom but don't need a professional camera.
customer_reviews.author: JOAO M E PEREIRA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for son. Takes beautiful photos. Relatively easy to use. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J D's Place

customer_reviews.title: good research tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to document ecology research. It has good resolution and a decent zoom lens which makes the documentation easy.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: what a nice camera???
customer_reviews.text: This an awesome camera. Have used this camera for the last one week and really works very well, very nice photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Kimathi

customer_reviews.title: Would've been great if it wasn't broken
customer_reviews.text: Would've been great if it wasn't broken. It was actually a good thing though, I ended up with a Canon and I'm much happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: ScottishMadman

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. My granddaughter saved her birthday and allowance money to buy this. She loves it. Her grandfather is so impressed, he wan'ts one for himself. It took great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie in Denver

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: love the Nikon Wi-Fi... took over 700 pictures on my vacation and they are great really a good camera recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Npolefox

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes wonderful photos with very little effort. In fact it is hard to mess up a picture. One needs to know very little about the technical aspects of photography to get very good photos. The only thing I was disappointed with is the video function of the camera. When taking videos, the camera does not focus well when panning to different subjects at varying distances from the camera. But other than that, it produces high end photos with the ease of a point and shoot. Also, the 42x zoom is spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: cjbook

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I normally use a larger 35mm but this one is great for the family to use plus the video is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the zoom - not very sharp. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX P520 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 42x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Black) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER
 



Superior image quality yet compact and portable, an Advanced Performance COOLPIX camera is perfect for memories captured in an instant yet cherished for a lifetime. State-of-the-art technologies, superb optics and impeccable style and design come together to make a COOLPIX Advanced performance camera second to none.

42x zoom power, professional-quality photos and videos, endless capabilities. For those seeking a comprehensive compact camera for zoom, image quality, versatility and technological innovation, look no further than the COOLPIX P520. Create pro-caliber photos and Full HD 1080p videos from mind-boggling distances, even in extremely low-light conditions. Track your travels and explore points of interest with built-in GPS. Take control of your vision with full P, S, A, M exposure modes. Add the optional WU-1a Wireless Mobile Adapter and share your shots in an instant, or control the camera with your compatible smartphone or tablet. From its superb 42x zoom NIKKOR glass lens and 18.1-megapixel low-light CMOS image sensor to its D-SLR-inspired design and 3.2-inch Vari-angle LCD, the COOLPIX P520 delivers the pinnacle of performance and zoom.






GET CLOSE FROM AFAR
CATCH VIEWS YOU MAY NOT HAVE SEEN BEFORE IN YOUR PHOTOS.
Every COOLPIX is designed around a genuine NIKKOR glass lens, the legendary optics that have made Nikon famous. The COOLPIX P520 features a 42x zoom NIKKOR lens that takes you from wide-angle group shots to telephoto close-ups in an instant. And don't worry about a little camera shake—lens-shift Vibration Reduction helps keep the shot steady even when your hands are not.

SEE WHERE YOU'VE BEEN
BUILT-IN GPS WITH POINTS OF INTEREST (POI) FOR CREATING AMAZING PHOTO JOURNALS
Relive the excitement of your travels in a whole new way. The COOLPIX P520 records the exact location of each shot you take, so you can follow the path of your adventure and every stunning view along the way! Share your journeys on Google Earth™, Google+™, and other social media sites or with the included Nikon View NX2 software. Built-in GPS helps you navigate unfamiliar destinations, and Points of Interest (POI) show you nearby photo-ops like scenic lookouts and historic landmarks. The COOLPIX P520 is the ultimate travel companion!

SHARE TO YOUR COMPATIBLE SMARTPHONE OR TABLET
COMPATIBLE WITH THE WU-1A WIRELESS MOBILE ADAPTER FOR ANYTIME, ANYWHERE SHARING
Connect the optional WU-1a Wireless Mobile Adapter and wirelessly transfer photos to your smartphone, tablet or any compatible Wi-Fi® enabled device. Use your smartphone to instantly upload your shots to the web or email them to a friend. Install Nikon's free Wireless Mobile Adapter Utility and remotely control the COOLPIX P520—see what the camera sees from your smartphone or tablet and fire off shots!



SUPERIOR LOW-LIGHT PERFORMANCE
HIGH-PERFORMANCE CMOS IMAGE SENSOR LETS YOU SHOOT WITHOUT A FLASH
Imagine being able to shoot without a flash at weddings, concerts, parties—anywhere your flash normally fires. You won't have to interrupt a moment to capture it, and your photos and HD videos will look more natural and true to your memory. The COOLPIX P520 performs so well in low light situations that, in most cases, using the flash is optional. Of course, when the lighting is extremely poor and you need a flash, it'll be there.

RECORD SUPERIOR VIDEOS
1080P FULL HD VIDEOS WITH STEREO SOUND FOR DAZZLING MOVIES
If you want a compact camera that shoots stunning Full HD videos, the COOLPIX P520 delivers. 1080p Full HD means exceptional video quality. Record the action, then connect to an HDTV and watch your videos come alive. A built-in mic records high-quality audio in stereo. Your videos will look and sound phenomenal.





PREMIUM ACCESSORIES
WU-1a Wireless Mobile Adapter 

The WU-1a wireless mobile adapter allows you to automatically send great images to your smart phone and even use your smart phone to remotely capture images from selcect Nikon cameras. With an easy to use app, now when you can’t wait to share that great shot you don’t have to. Share it to your smartphone in a instant. Nikon EN-EL5 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery

The EN-EL5 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery allows you to take photos as many times as you can charge your battery
feature_bullets: Powerful 42x zoom that lets you shoot amazing close-ups
Built-in GPS records the location of each shot you take
Wi-Fi WU-1a accessory (not included) allows you to easily share your shots anytime anywhere
18.1 MP CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality and enhanced low-light performance.Record videos in Full 1080p HD with stereo sound.
What's in the box:UC-E6 USB Cable, EN-EL5 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery, EH-69P AC Adapter/Charger, AN-CP21 Strap, LC-CP24, Lens Cap, NikonView NX 2 CD-ROM.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars374 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
